name: Bunny Roll
description:
Bunny Roll - an infinite platformer game. Stay alive as long as possible.

This game is a remake of the Rapid Roll, a game I played a long time ago on old Nokia phones.

How to play - use left and right arrows or "a" and "d" keys. You can teleport if you go outside screen.

This game is just a prototype. On request I can upload the source-code.
